# SnailSploit - Kai Aizen

> AI Security Researcher, LLM Jailbreaking Expert, 5x CVE Holder, Creator of AATMF and P.R.O.M.P.T Frameworks

SnailSploit is the security research hub of Kai Aizen (The Jailbreak Chef), specializing in adversarial AI, LLM jailbreaking, prompt injection, and vulnerability research. Author of "Adversarial Minds: The Anatomy of Social Engineering and the Psychology of Manipulation."

## Research Areas
- LLM Jailbreaking & Prompt Injection
- AI Threat Modeling (AATMF Framework)
- WordPress Security & CVE Research
- Social Engineering

## Key Pages
- About: https://snailsploit.com/about
- Frameworks: https://snailsploit.com/frameworks
- AATMF: https://snailsploit.com/frameworks/aatmf
- P.R.O.M.P.T: https://snailsploit.com/frameworks/prompt
- CVE Disclosures: https://snailsploit.com/security-research/cves
- AI Security Research: https://snailsploit.com/ai-security
- Book: https://snailsploit.com/adversarial-minds
